title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-8.2 - Permanent zone
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-8.2 - Permanent zone

State Regulations

The Lake George Park, as that term is defined in ECL, section 43-0103(1), exclusive of State or municipally owned land, is hereby
declared to be a permanent zone. The precise courses and distances of said zone
are set forth in the referenced statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-8.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
